column5: I made the call today and found an 06 Yamaha 4 stroke 8 HP high thrust with electric start and power trim. It's all mine I will pick it up a week from Saturday.  :clapping:
That sounds like a nice kicker for your PolarKraft. -Brian
Wow that sounds like a really nice lawnmower bud. You should be able to cut the grass in half the time and then go fishin with it.   Art
Nice find Taper. Did you hook up the hot tub yet?
Cast away I wish. With all the other projects on the go it will have to wait until spring.
So there really is a hot tub? I figured it was some kind of weird Red Green like contraption powered by an 8 horse Yamaha 4 stroke
GREAT!!! Now you're all set to catch some big fish for team 6!!! Go get 'em!
Congrats, they make a great motor.
very nice you know people are getting lazy when they buy a 8hp with electric start and power trim..  wish mine had it...lol
